trans-unit.source: Declares permissions for loading types from assemblies that are used by a XAML reader or writer.
trans-unit.target: 宣告類型載入 XAML 讀取器或寫入器所使用的組件的權限。

trans-unit.source: XamlLoadPermission is relevant for scenarios such as whether internal types are permitted to load under partial trust.
trans-unit.target: 是 XamlLoadPermission 是關於的案例，例如內部型別是否允許在部分信任下載入。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref> class, using an enumerable set of specific <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref>類別，使用特定的可列舉集<xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: A call to this constructor initializes the <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A> collection with each `allowedAccess` entry as an item, and sets the return for <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> to `false` in the created instance.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫這個建構函式初始化<xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A>集合與每個`allowedAccess`做為項目，項目，並設定為傳回<xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A>至`false`中建立的執行個體。</xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> </xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A>

trans-unit.source: An enumerable set of specific <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 特定的可列舉集<xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: allowedAccess is .
trans-unit.target: allowedAccessis .

trans-unit.source: allowedAccess contained invalid information, such as a null item.
trans-unit.target: allowedAccess包含無效的資訊，例如 null 項目。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref> class, using existing permissions.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref>類別，使用現有的權限。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> sets the return for <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> to `true` in the created instance.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>設定用於傳回<xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A>至`true`中建立的執行個體。</xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A></xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>

trans-unit.source: Any call to this constructor sets the <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A> collection to `null` because it is not relevant if permissions are being reported rather than <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel>.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式的任何呼叫設定<xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A>集合`null`因為它不是相關如果正在報告的權限而不是<xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel>.</xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel> </xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState"></xref> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState"> </xref>列舉值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref> class, using a single <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref>類別，使用單一<xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: A call to this constructor initializes the <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A> collection with `allowedAccess` as the only item, and sets the return for <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> to `false` in the created instance.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫這個建構函式初始化<xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A>集合`allowedAccess`當做唯一的項目，並設定為傳回<xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A>至`false`中建立的執行個體。</xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> </xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A>

trans-unit.source: The defining <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: 定義<xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: allowedAccess is .
trans-unit.target: allowedAccessis .

trans-unit.source: Gets the list of all <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel"></xref> values that this <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref> represents.
trans-unit.target: 取得所有清單<xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel"></xref>值這<xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref>代表。

trans-unit.source: If the current <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission> is initialized such that <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> is `true`, AllowedAccess may be `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果目前<xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission>初始化使得<xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A>是`true`，可能是 AllowedAccess `null`。</xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> </xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission>

trans-unit.source: A read-only list of <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel"></xref> values, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 唯讀清單<xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel"></xref>值，或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: See Remarks.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱 < 備註 >。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns an identical copy of the current <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 建立並傳回目前的相同複本<xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Per the interface contract of <xref:System.Security.IPermission> this value is <xref:System.Security.IPermission> in the signature but can be cast to <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission>.
trans-unit.target: 每個介面合約<xref:System.Security.IPermission>這個值是<xref:System.Security.IPermission>簽章中，但可以轉換成<xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission>.</xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission> </xref:System.Security.IPermission> </xref:System.Security.IPermission>

trans-unit.source: A copy of the current <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 目前的複本<xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Reconstructs a security object with a specified state from an XML encoding.
trans-unit.target: 重新建構具有指定狀態的 XML 編碼方式的安全性物件。

trans-unit.source: The XML encoding to use to reconstruct the security object.
trans-unit.target: XML 編碼用來重新建構安全性物件。

trans-unit.source: elem is .
trans-unit.target: elemis .

trans-unit.source: elem does not contain the XML encoding for a .
trans-unit.target: elem不包含的 XML 編碼方式 。

trans-unit.source: -or- The version attribute within elem is not supported.
trans-unit.target: -version 屬性內elem不支援。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether this <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref> includes a specified <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel"></xref> in its <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess*> list.
trans-unit.target: 傳回是否這<xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref>包含指定<xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel"></xref>中其<xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess*>清單。</xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess*>

trans-unit.source: The specific <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel"></xref> to check for.
trans-unit.target: 特定<xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel"></xref>檢查。

trans-unit.source: if requestedAccess exists as an item in the list of the current .
trans-unit.target: 如果 requestedAccess 形式中的項目存在的目前清單 。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: requestedAccess is null.
trans-unit.target: requestedAccess為 null。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref> that is the intersection of the current <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref> and the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: 建立並傳回<xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref>也就是目前的交集<xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref>及指定的權限。

trans-unit.source: For union, intersect, and subset logic, <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> is checked first, and might return a result based solely on that check.
trans-unit.target: Union、 intersect，和子集邏輯<xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A>已經選取，第一次，且可能會傳回結果，只會依據該檢查。</xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A>

trans-unit.source: Next, <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A> is checked.
trans-unit.target: 下一步<xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A>已核取。</xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref> to intersect with the current <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref>與目前交集<xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: A new permission that represents the intersection of the current <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref> and the specified <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 新的權限，表示目前的交集<xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref>和指定<xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This new permission is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the intersection is empty.
trans-unit.target: 這個新權限是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果交集是空的。

trans-unit.source: target is not or is not a .
trans-unit.target: targetis not or is not a .

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the current <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref> is a subset of the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: 決定是否目前<xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref>是所指定權限的子集。

trans-unit.source: For union, intersect, and subset logic, <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> is checked first, and might return a result based solely on that check.
trans-unit.target: Union、 intersect，和子集邏輯<xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A>已經選取，第一次，且可能會傳回結果，只會依據該檢查。</xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A>

trans-unit.source: Next, <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A> is checked.
trans-unit.target: 下一步<xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A>已核取。</xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A>

trans-unit.source: If `target` is `null` and the current <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission> is both <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> `false` and has an empty <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A> list, this method returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果`target`是`null`和目前<xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission>同時為<xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A>`false`和含有空白<xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A>清單，這個方法會傳回`true`。</xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A> </xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> </xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission>

trans-unit.source: A permission that is to be tested for the subset relationship.
trans-unit.target: 要測試子集關聯性的權限。

trans-unit.source: Can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the current <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref> is a subset of the specified permission; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果目前<xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref>是所指定權限的子集，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: target is not or is not a .
trans-unit.target: targetis not or is not a .

trans-unit.source: Returns whether this <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref> denotes unrestricted permissions.
trans-unit.target: 傳回是否這<xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref>代表無限制的權限。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref> denotes unrestricted permissions.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果這個<xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref>代表無限制的權限。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if this <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref> has specific access level restrictions in <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess*>, or has no permissions.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>如果這個<xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref>具有特定存取層級限制<xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess*>，或沒有權限。</xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess*>

trans-unit.source: Creates an XML encoding of this <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref> and its current state.
trans-unit.target: 建立 XML 編碼方式，這個<xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref>和其目前狀態。

trans-unit.source: An XML encoding of this <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref>, including any state information.
trans-unit.target: 這個 XML 編碼方式<xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref>，包含所有狀態資訊。

trans-unit.source: Creates a permission that is the union of the current <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref> and the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: 建立權限聯集的目前<xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref>及指定的權限。

trans-unit.source: For union, intersect, and subset logic, <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> is checked first, and might return a result based solely on that check.
trans-unit.target: Union、 intersect，和子集邏輯<xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A>已經選取，第一次，且可能會傳回結果，只會依據該檢查。</xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A>

trans-unit.source: Next, <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A> is checked.
trans-unit.target: 下一步<xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A>已核取。</xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A>

trans-unit.source: If `other` is `null`, the current <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission> is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果`other`是`null`，目前<xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission>傳回。</xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref> to combine with the current <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref>結合目前<xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: A new <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref> that represents the union of the current <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref> and the specified <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 新<xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref> ，代表目前的聯集<xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"></xref>和指定<xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: other is not or is not a .
trans-unit.target: otheris not or is not a .
